response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the fruitcake inside the oven. The next step is to close the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the oven.
(2) Put the fruitcake inside the oven.
(3) Close the oven.
(4) Turn on the oven to cook the fruitcake.
(5) Turn off the oven after cooking.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Close the oven
    oven_wuinhm_0 = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")
    close(robot, oven_wuinhm_0)
    donothing(env)
